newsitem.title: UK: U.S./Bund spread stable, gilt gap widens.
newsitem.headline: U.S./Bund spread stable, gilt gap widens.

text.p: 1708 GMT - U.S./Bund spread steady on day's session, wider from Thursday in thin U.S. bond trade. Gilt/Bund spread gaps open as profit-taking erodes part of gilt market's recent gains. BTP/Bund spread stable after Eurostat approves Italy's Euro tax and state railway financing plans for use in reducing the 1997 budget deficit.
Government bond spreads are calculated from Reuter benchmark bond price data and adjusted to take into account interest payment frequency.
